column7: You made it to the goal post! Next time pick up the Quaffle first. 15 points to Ravenclaw!

Oooh - that hurt!  Need to keep an eye out for those rogue Bludgers! Watch out for Errol!  Spit those feathers out and get back in the game! Bad luck in today's match - you've been knocked you straight off your broom. Head to Madam Pomfrey to get those bruises seen to.
You've got the Quaffle! Now head to the goal! 20 points to Slytherin!
